Articles.Content:
I took some time on my sleeping time this week to update KAS models and textures to have them ready for next update.

Its something I wanted for a while but then KIS happened

Here's a preview :

http://i.imgur.com/wR4twlF.png

Mmm... dat winch doe. =D

Looking pretty awesome.

Here's a preview :

http://i.imgur.com/wR4twlF.png

Nice!

Can't wait to glue those all over my rockets again. EVA feels so pointless now, without KAS.

I took some time on my sleeping time this week to update KAS models and textures to have them ready for next update.

Its something I wanted for a while but then KIS happened

Here's a preview :

Hey those look really good! Really looking forward to kas / kis integration

Les mecs, vous gÃƒÂ©rez la pistache ! J'ai hÃƒÂ¢te de l'avoir cette mise ÃƒÂ  jour. Un grand merci ÃƒÂ  vous de la part des joueurs francophones qui utilisent votre mod ! et surtout, prenez votre temps, on sait que KSP n'est pas votre seule vie. Sinon encore merci

Thank for your work. This mod is awesome !
I have a mission to set up a moon base on Minnmus. I can't properly set up a drilling base without piping resources with kerbal attachment system. Hope it gets finished soon.

Same here, on Minmus.

I train, make tests, while waiting for KAS

Then I'll start a new game.
Interesting, in the Endurance mod, the KAS modules cause great lag... I look forward to this mod being updated!

And without KAS containers you have no need for MM anyway since that was only for adding grabability to parts.

So wait... if I drop something in KIS, how am I going to pick it up again?

So wait... if I drop something in KIS, how am I going to pick it up again?

You pick it up with KIS.
Now I want the KAS update even more!

I took some time on my sleeping time this week to update KAS models and textures to have them ready for next update.

Its something I wanted for a while but then KIS happened

Here's a preview :

http://i.imgur.com/wR4twlF.png

Those are some great parts. I love the softer texture, it's a bit more subtle. Looking forward to the update.

I took some time on my sleeping time this week to update KAS models and textures to have them ready for next update.

Its something I wanted for a while but then KIS happened

Here's a preview :

Absolutely splendid!
Update to KAS for 1.0 coming ever?? Can't be that much difference. Been a week and a half..
Well, he's yanking out the functionality moving to KIS and making KAS work with KIS. He's updating models. He's got to get it to 1.0. I think that's quite a bit of difference.

Indeed, I edited the setting.cfg file to change the hotkey, as KospY explained on KIS thread's 1st page...

I saw where he suggested changing the grab hotkey, but have not played the new version yet so I do not understand why you need to move the hotkey, can you explain please?

I saw where he suggested changing the grab hotkey, but have not played the new version yet so I do not understand why you need to move the hotkey, can you explain please?

Because weird things happen when you press a hotkey that is bound to 2 different grab commands.

Because weird things happen when you press a hotkey that is bound to 2 different grab commands.

I deleted the parts and MM cfgs per the KIS clean up instructions, do I still need to change the hotkey? What did you change yours to that was not already being used for something else?

Update to KAS for 1.0 coming ever?? Can't be that much difference. Been a week and a half..

A little rude don't you think? Please be patient with the mod makers...they make our games run.

Edited May 6, 2015 by Smurfalot

Update to KAS for 1.0 coming ever?? Can't be that much difference. Been a week and a half..

Talk about entitlement issues... this is a mod made by a fan in their spare time. You haven't paid for it. If you don't like the speed of development make your own mod?

Well, he's yanking out the functionality moving to KIS and making KAS work with KIS. He's updating models. He's got to get it to 1.0. I think that's quite a bit of difference.

So, some parts from KAS will be abandoned and some new replacement parts will be offered by KIS, but not all of them, right?

Now we will have to have both KAS and KIS?

So, some parts from KAS will be abandoned and some new replacement parts will be offered by KIS, but not all of them, right?

Now we will have to have both KAS and KIS?

KIS will be the engine that handles storage, attachment etc. KAS will be like a parts pack of cool parts.

So, some parts from KAS will be abandoned and some new replacement parts will be offered by KIS, but not all of them, right?

Now we will have to have both KAS and KIS?

KAS will require KIS, but KIS can function on it's own.

I took some time on my sleeping time this week to update KAS models and textures to have them ready for next update.

Its something I wanted for a while but then KIS happened

i can not wait for this update, it is the only thing holding me back from recreating this vehicle but bigger and better!

http://www.twitch.tv/mechrior/c/2229137
You're awesome KospY, thanks for KAS and KIS. And a big thanks to those who help you with it too. Please don't feel like we are trying to rush you or demand your work... we're just hooked on KAS. ;p
We are, we really, really are!
it's almost as if we've become attached
